full_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 2kg Pair (2 x 2kg), Orange & Red Hex Hand Weights with Non-Slip Coated Grip for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Training for Women and Men

reasoning.keyword_integration: Integrated top keywords: 'dumbbells set', 'weights', 'hand weights', 'weights for women', 'gym weights', 'weight set'. Corrected weight to verified 2kg and included both orange/red colors. Used 'for women and men' to capture broad audience keywords.
